text: On 25 December, 2011, there were a number of attacks on Christmas Day during church services in northern Nigeria. There were bombings and shootings at churches in Madalla (near the capital, Abuja), Jos, Gadaka and Damaturu. At least 39 people were killed. The attacks were claimed by the Islamist group Boko Haram. == References == Category:2011 in Africa Category:2010s explosions in Africa Category:2010s in Nigeria Category:Attacks on buildings and structures in Africa Category:Attacks on buildings and structures in the 2010s Category:Attacks on churches Category:Mass shootings in Nigeria Category:Islamic terrorist incidents in Africa Category:Islamic terrorist incidents in the 2010s Category:Mass murder in Africa Category:Mass murder in the 2010s Category:2010s mass shootings in Africa Category:Murder in 2011 Category:Suicide bombings in Africa Category:Suicide car and truck bombings Category:Terrorist incidents in Africa in the 2010s Category:December 2011 events
title: Christmas 2011 Nigeria attacks
